job_tasks.phrase: wij helpen organisaties identificeren waar AI van toegevoegde waarde kan zijn (en waar niet).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the consultancy aspect of identifying business value for AI, aligning with understanding business context and translating needs into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: vervolgens gaan wij aan de slag met het bouwen en opschalen van deze maatwerkoplossingen (gebaseerd op ons eigen platform).
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to building and scaling custom solutions, which is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Het opzetten en doorontwikkelen van ons interne, composable platform. Deze bouwstenen vormen de basis van onze maatwerkapplicaties.
job_tasks.justification: Developing and further developing an internal platform and building blocks for custom applications falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Het opzetten en opschalen van maatwerkapplicaties, gebaseerd op al bestaande (GenAI-)oplossingen en/of ons platform.
job_tasks.justification: This describes setting up and scaling custom applications, which is a software development and integration task, even when based on existing solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Jij zorgt ervoor dat deze precies aansluiten op de behoeften van (de eindgebruikers van) onze klanten.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring applications align with customer needs is part of the software development lifecycle, focusing on delivering functional and user-centric software.

soft_skills.phrase: Jij vindt het gaaf om aan de basis te staan van een impactvolle organisatie.
soft_skills.justification: This indicates a desire to be foundational and contribute to an impactful organization, suggesting an innovative and ownership mindset.

soft_skills.phrase: Jij vindt transparantie en betrokkenheid belangrijk en denkt graag mee over hoe we samen successen kunnen behalen.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the importance of transparency, involvement, and collaborative success, which are key communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Jij krijgt graag de ruimte om te werken aan zaken die bijdragen aan de groei en ontwikkeling van Algemi.
soft_skills.justification: This shows a desire for growth and development, indicating a willingness to learn and adapt.

soft_skills.phrase: Jij begrijpt hoe belangrijk het is dat je als t√©am goed opereert. Dit betekent dat je elkaar goed kent, elkaar respecteert, elkaar beter maakt en samen successen viert.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly describes the importance of team operation, mutual respect, improvement, and celebrating successes, all core aspects of communication and collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on software development and integration tasks (Macro-Category A), specifically building and scaling a platform and custom applications. While it mentions AI and GenAI as areas of consultancy and as a basis for solutions, the core responsibilities are about the software engineering aspects of building and integrating these. There are no explicit tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG (Macro-Category B). Therefore, the role is best classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, where software engineering is the primary focus, and AI is an integrated component of the solutions being built.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly emphasizes software development and integration. The mention of AI/GenAI is in the context of consultancy and as a basis for solutions, not as a core development task for the candidate. The soft skills also align well with a software engineering role. The confidence is high, but not a perfect 5, as the exact nature of the 'GenAI solutions' they build upon is not detailed, leaving a slight ambiguity about the depth of AI involvement beyond integration.
